title: Not Playing
text: I‚Äôm incredibly frustrated at the fact that songs aren‚Äôt playing anymore. I‚Äôve been using this app and paying for premium for a long time and have never had this issue. I thought it was my phone or the bluetooth connection but it‚Äôs not, because other streaming apps will work just fine. It used to automatically connect to my car seamlessly, but now still connects yet refuses to play any music. I will select a song to play and it won‚Äôt play. Trying to play music through my phone speaker (without connecting to a device) does not work either. I‚Äôve uninstalled and reinstalled the app and that fixes it for a few days but then back to not working. PLEASE fix this because why am I paying for a streaming app that won‚Äôt stream?  I‚Äôve enjoyed using Spotify but I can‚Äôt even use it now.

title: Unable to find some songs.
text:
I tried a lot to find and listen some bengali music of Sanjeeb Chowdhury, like 'Bhalo laage na', 'kotha bolbo na'. Even an album of him (named 'Jochnabihar') is missing. 
Additionally some songs are not oriented by the song name. For example, a song of bengali legend Azam Khan's 'alal o dulal' has been named as 'jibonta vora.'
A Lot of cover song of 'AnnenMayKanteriet' isn't available here. Like, 'One day', 'Roxanne', 'Leavin' etc. 
Even unable to find and listen of Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan's song 'Shaman Paiyan' etc. Plz try to fix and add these song and album as well.

title: Honest Review
text: No other music app comes close to finding my taste in music and ease of use when it comes to creating playlists.  The only improvements I think that can be made would be in the playlist section, wish you could auto sort by artist, alphabetize, and/or genre with an option to leave as is edited in your playlist. With that said I love the option to add from other playlists and the recommendations within the playlist. Spotify is the best music app out there, never stop improving! Never censor, and always vibe! üíØ

title: frustrating
text:
I have written in so many times about the fact that y‚Äôall should have a scroll button for people with bigger playlists. It‚Äôs annoying to sit there in my car or wherever I am and scroll over and over to get to the bottom. If you just put a scroll feature on the side, it would make things so much easier. Also, it‚Äôs weird how when you search an artist, you can really only go to for that artist or click on all of their discography but there isn‚Äôt a way to pull up every single song they‚Äôve made.

My biggest complaint, however, is even when I‚Äôm in great Wi-Fi with all of my bars and 5G activated it takes sometimes minutes, or multiple tries of closing the app and restarting it. One of my playlists has a around 5000 songs. But if the playlists aren‚Äôt able to handle that much, they shouldn‚Äôt allow you to create such big playlists.
